EmailTemplate.name: IC Engage_March12_2014.Invite 2.3
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Client}}: your contractor engagement webinar reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly: There's still time to join us on Wednesday, March 12 at 1 p.m. ET, when we will hold a free webinar titled "5 Steps to Risk-Free Independent Contractor Engagement <http://www.mbopartners.com/webinars/2014/5-steps-risk-free-independent-contractor-engagement>." During this hour-long webinar, we will offer 5 actionable steps you can take to cut risk out of your contractor engagement, as well as streamline the processes you currently have in place. Register today <http://www.mbopartners.com/webinars/2014/5-steps-risk-free-independent-contractor-engagement>! ___________________________________ Dave Putt VP, Consultant and Client Services MBO Partners t: 703-793-6020 e: dputt@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
